title: Set Airflow (manual fan speed)
description: How to set fan speed by hand.
causes: Another function may override the manual level (e.g., Weekly Program).
steps: Open SPEED.
Choose the desired level and press OK.
If it does not change, check Weekly Settings or alarms.
fixes: Turn OFF the Weekly Program or edit its schedule.

title: Weekly Program overrides manual airflow
description: When Weekly Program is ON, airflow follows the schedule.
causes: Scheduled profiles set fan levels by time.
steps: Open WEEKLY SETTINGS.
Toggle ON → OFF or edit PROGRAM.
Set your airflow again in SPEED.
fixes: Disable Weekly Program for full manual control.

title: Input 1 (0–10V) regulates airflow
description: An external 0–10V signal can control fan speed.
steps: Open INPUT SETTINGS → 1 → REG AIR FLOW.
Check UNIT (0V=STOP / 10V=STOP).
Remove/adjust external signal if you need manual control.
fixes: Disconnect or tune the external source.

title: Bypass settings may affect airflow
description: AUTO or MANUAL BYPASS can change or limit fan behavior.
causes: Min outdoor temperature rule blocks some states.
steps: Open BYPASS settings.
Check AUTO/MANUAL and temperature limits.
Adjust or disable if airflow is limited.
fixes: Choose the desired mode or relax limits.

title: Clima settings (comfort profiles)
description: Preset comfort rules can change airflow and temperature behavior.
causes: Active profile applies its own fan/temperature rules.
steps: Open CLIMA SETTINGS.
Review the active profile and its targets.
Adjust profile or switch to a simpler mode.
fixes: Use a basic profile if you want manual control.

title: Hysteresis temperature (ON/OFF points)
description: Defines when heating/cooling turns ON and OFF.
steps: Open HYSTERESIS TEMP.
Set ON and OFF points (heating/cooling).
Confirm with OK.
fixes: Use moderate gaps for stable comfort.

title: Service menu (password)
steps: Open SERVICE.
Enter the password.
Change only if you know the impact.
fixes: Contact support if you need access.

title: Update & sensor settings
steps: Open SERVICE → MISE A JOUR for update.
Open REGL. SONDES for sensor settings.
